verses.verse: Bildad: How Can Man Be Righteous? Then (Job 8:1; 18:1) Bildad the Shuhite answered and said:
“Dominion and fear belong to Him; He makes peace in His high places.
Is there any number to His armies? Upon whom does (James 1:17) His light not rise?
(Job 4:17; 15:14; Ps. 130:3; 143:2) How then can man be righteous before God? Or how can he be ((Job 14:4)) pure who is born of a woman?
If even the moon does not shine, And the stars are not pure in His (Job 15:15) sight,
How much less man, who is (Ps. 22:6) a maggot, And a son of man, who is a worm?”
